00041   typedef enum {  ValueType_Int8        =  1,  ValueType_Int16       =  2,  ValueType_Int32       =  3,  ValueType_Int64       =  4,  ValueType_Float       =  5,  ValueType_Double      =  6,  ValueType_Bool        =  7,  ValueType_BoolNull    =  8,  ValueType_String      =  9,  ValueType_WString     = 10,  ValueType_VRTObject   = 11

00065   class Value : public VRTObject {

00068     private: char type;   // Data type indicator.
00069     private: bool owner;  // Responsible for deleting memory (true) or not (false)?

00071       int8_t     bval;    vector<int8_t    > *barray;
00072       int16_t    ival;    vector<int16_t   > *iarray;

00074       int64_t    xval;    vector<int64_t   > *xarray;
00075       float      fval;    vector<float     > *farray;

00080       wstring   *sval;    vector<wstring*  > *sarray;

00082       Value     *vval;    vector<Value*    > *varray;
00083     } value;
